about_the_game:
Traverse the dark fantasy world of Tilsa

Journey through Tilsa as Zafira, a respected scholar branded an outcast after her controversial findings. Gather ancient artifacts and tomes throughout your adventure, each one unlocking fragments of Tilsa's intricate and captivating past.

Confront the Drothar in strategic melee combat

Stand against the relentless onslaught of invading Drothar. Confront diverse groups of enemies, requiring you to adapt and evolve your combat strategy. Each encounter is a test of skill, presenting unique challenges that continuously test your aptitude in battle.

Balance the power and price of channeling spells

Channel powerful spells to shift the tides in your favor – but be warned, such power comes with a price. Offensive and defensive magic is your ally in battle and a resource on your journey. Use it wisely to manipulate your environment and overcome obstacles in your path.

Shape your fate with strategic choices

The decisions you make hold the power to transform your gameplay experience. With dynamic difficulty adjustments, the choices you make directly shape the challenges and narrative that await you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700KF
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device

short_description: Confront fate in Forlorn Outcast, an immersive souls-like RPG. Stand your ground against the Drothar hordes, channel powerful spells, and discover the dark fantasy realm of Tilsa as you ascend from outcast to legend.
